title: Tesla Unveils Latest Electric Model, Wall Street Not Impressed
teaser: Tesla founder Elon Musk recently unveiled an all-electric, all-wheel drive with some "auto-pilot" features.
contentencoded:
Tesla founder Elon Musk recently unveiled a new model — the Tesla D — an all-electric, all-wheel drive with some “auto-pilot” features like automated lane changing.

Recode‘s James Temple joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to talk about the car, and why Wall Street was not impressed.

  • Recode: My Night With Elon’s D, a Tell-All

Guest

  • James Temple, senior editor for ReCode. He tweets @jtemple.
